title: question about icons
body: will the warring emperor icon last forever? (warring kingdoms azir)

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, this Icon, as well as the other Lunar Revel Icons, are only available until the end of the event, so make sure to grab the icons you want before they're gone!

(〃･ω･)ﾉ~☆･ﾟ+｡*ﾟ･.+
ahhh you responded to me ;-; I have no choice but to buy it now
The Azir Lunar Revel [icon ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/lunar-revel-2017#/champion/azir)will be available until Febuary 2.
